text: Guerrieri is an Italian surname. Notable people with the surname include: * Ascenzio Guerrieri (died 1645), Roman Catholic prelate who served as Bishop of Castellaneta * Esteban Guerrieri (born 1985), Argentine racing driver * Gerardo Guerrieri (1920-1986), Italian film director, playwright and screenwriter * Guido Guerrieri (born 1996), Italian footballer * Giovanni Francesco Guerrieri (1589-1655), Italian painter * Lorenza Guerrieri (born 1944), Italian actress * Romolo Guerrieri (born 1931), Italian film director and screenwriter * Taylor Guerrieri (born 1992), American professional baseball pitcher * Vittorio Guerrieri (born 1958), Italian actor and voice actor Category:Italian-language surnames
title: Guerrieri
